column4: Today (2024-Aug-07) is Metageitniṓn 3, τρίτῃ ἱσταμένου Μεταγειτνιῶνος, day 33 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

Today (2024-Sep-04) is Boēdromiṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 61 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
This Boēdromiṓn will have 29 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) as opposed to a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) of 30.

Festivals in Boēdromiṓn:

5: Genesia (Γενέσια)
6: Marathon (Μαραθών)
7: Boedromia (Βοηδρόμια)
13–24: Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια)
Today (2024-Sep-05) is Boēdromiṓn 2, δευτέρᾳ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 62 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-06) is Boēdromiṓn 3, τρίτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 63 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-07) is Boēdromiṓn 4, τετράδι ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 64 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-08) is Boēdromiṓn 5, πέμπτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 65 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 The Genesia (Γενέσια), a festival of the dead, was possibly celebrated on this day.\n\n
Today (2024-Sep-09) is Boēdromiṓn 6, ἕκτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 66 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 On this day, Athenians celebrated their victory over invading Persians at the battle of Marathon. The sixth of every month was sacred to Artemis, but since the Marathon celebration included a procession to Agrai, Boēdromiṓn 6 may have specifically been the festival of Artemis Agrotera\n\n
Today (2024-Sep-10) is Boēdromiṓn 7, ἑβδόμῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 67 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 The Boedromia (Βοηδρόμια) may have been celebrated this day in honor of Apollo Boedromios. The seventh of every month was sacred to Apollo.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boedromia
Today (2024-Sep-11) is Boēdromiṓn 8, ὀγδόῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 68 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-12) is Boēdromiṓn 9, ἐνάτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 69 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-13) is Boēdromiṓn 10, δεκάτῃ ἱσταμένου Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 70 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-14) is Boēdromiṓn 11, ἑνδεκάτῃ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 71 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-15) is Boēdromiṓn 12, δωδεκάτῃ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 72 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-16) is Boēdromiṓn 13, τρίτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 73 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 Kicking off the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια), on this day the epheboi (young men) made a procession to Eleusis.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-17) is Boēdromiṓn 14, τετράδι ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 74 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 On this day, the epheboi (young men) who had made the procession to Eleusis the previous day made a procession back to Athens carrying the sacred objects to the Eleusinion.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-18) is Boēdromiṓn 15, πέμπτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 75 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 Today was the “agurmos” (ἀγυρμός, “Gathering”), the first day of the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια)\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-19) is Boēdromiṓn 16, ἕκτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 76 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 Today was the second day of the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια), “halade mustai” (ἅλαδε μύσται, “Initiates to the Sea”).\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-20) is Boēdromiṓn 17, ἑβδόμῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 77 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 The Epidauria (Ἐπιδαύρια) was celebrated on this day, a festival for Asklepios, the god of healing, and sort of a separate festival within the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια).\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-21) is Boēdromiṓn 18, ὀγδόῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 78 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 The Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια) were still going on this day, but we are not sure what happened (they are secret rites, after all).\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-22) is Boēdromiṓn 19, ἐνάτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 79 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 On this day there was a procession from the Eleusinion in Athens to Eleusis for the Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια). It began late in the day and did not arrive in Eleusis (about ten miles from Athens) until nighttime.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-23) is Boēdromiṓn 20, δεκάτῃ προτέρᾳ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 80 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 Today was the first full day of celebrations of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια) that took place in Eleusis. What went on has been kept secret for thousands of years.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-24) is Boēdromiṓn 21, δεκάτῃ ὑστέρᾳ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 81 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 Today was the second full day of celebrations of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια) that took place in Eleusis. No one ever leaked the secret of these mystery rites.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-25) is Boēdromiṓn 22, ἐνάτῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 82 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 Today was still part of the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια). Everyone who knew what the rites were on this day took that knowledge to their grave.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-26) is Boēdromiṓn 23, ὀγδόῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 83 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 There was a special meeting of the Athenian council at Eleusis on this day as part of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια), and initiates returned to Athens.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-27) is Boēdromiṓn 24, ἑβδόμῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 84 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 On this day, the final part of the celebration of the Eleusinian Mysteries (τὰ Μυστήρια) was a meeting of the Athenian council in the Eleusinion in Athens.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleusinian_Mysteries
Today (2024-Sep-28) is Boēdromiṓn 25, ἕκτῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 85 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-29) is Boēdromiṓn 26, πέμπτῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 86 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Sep-30) is Boēdromiṓn 27, τετράδι φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 87 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-01) is Boēdromiṓn 28, τρίτῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 88 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-02) is Boēdromiṓn 29, ἕνῃ καὶ νέᾳ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 89 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-03) is Puanopsiṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 90 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
This Puanopsiṓn will have 30 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) as opposed to a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) of 29.

Festivals in Puanopsiṓn:

-1: Khalkeia (Xαλkεῖα)
6: Proerosia (Προηροσία)
6: Oskhoporia (Ὠσχοφόρια)
7: Pyanopsia (Πυανόψια)
8: Theseia (Θησεῖα)
9: Stenia (Στήνια)
11–13: Thesmophoria (Θεσμοφόρια)
Today (2024-Oct-04) is Puanopsiṓn 2, δευτέρᾳ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 91 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-05) is Puanopsiṓn 3, τρίτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 92 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
